group_1.textLeft: It may be leftovers from yesterday, but here@comes the second cutlet for this morning!

group_1.textRight: This gonna give you a double win for both@work and the match alike?

group_1.textLeft: You got me right!
Juri, you contacted them too?

group_1.textRight: Did that yesterday.
And today, I'm gonna get rid of that sore spot@festering in the corner of my heart.

group_1.textLeft: Good luck with that.

group_1.textRight: Heehee.@You too, old man.

group_1.textLeft: Have you heard?
Juri challenged Yuna to a duel.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I know.@Yuna was there to explain.

group_1.textLeft: But, what if it changes their power dynamic…?
Also, we can't rule out the possibility that this@is a trap set by Ryuugasaki.

group_1.textCenter: In my humble opinion, the choral part is better@to be sung by those who can be trusted,
even if that may cause a slight discrepancy@in the number of people.

group_1.textLeft: Juri didn't seem to have any objections@to Torayamachi's policy…

group_1.textRight: Maybe she did, but just didn't want to make@it bigger than it already was…

group_1.textLeft: So, this whole duel thing today is just for@the two of them to talk things out…?

group_1.textRight: Indeed. It’s just, by some chance,@Torayamachi might meet its downfall…

group_1.textLeft: In that case,@let's see if we can all select our parts first.

group_1.textRight: U-um, I agree, it's completely fine@to make adjustments afterwards.

group_1.textCenter: (Thanks to these annoyingass bitches,@I’m about ready to go over here…)

group_1.textRight: Here you are.

group_1.textLeft: I’m all set here.@If you’re ready too, Yuna, we can get started.

group_1.textRight: What a surprise it was for me,@to find you still bitter from that loss.

group_1.textLeft: I was shocked about it myself,@but it does make loads of sense.
Thanks to the disappearance of that@mysterious enemy Kyubey,
all that drowned-out frustration@came flooding back to me.

group_1.textRight: So, if you defeat me,@are you going to take the wheel of Futatsugi?

group_1.textLeft: That's just a bunch of my Ryuugasaki girls@making a fuss. I myself ain’t interested.
Plus, I told those who might get the wrong@idea that this ain’t got nothing to do with ‘em.

group_1.textRight: As for my side, I have also informed my people@that this fight is private and personal.

group_1.textLeft: Then, we can do this without hesitation.
Let's see who’s gonna get her ass mauled:@me, or you.

group_1.textRight: Hehehe -- watch me accept all the feelings you’ve@felt since then with my whole body.

group_1.textLeft: Damn straight, “Sis” --@embrace just how “sick” I am!

group_1.textRight: Gladly.@Go ahead.

group_1.textLeft: Hyaaaah…!

group_1.textRight: Hmph…!![flashEffect:flashWhite1]

group_1.textLeft: What?! Ryuugasaki’s Magical Girls@went to watch the duel?!

group_1.textRight: Those girls should’ve also learned@what’s happening from Juri, but…
Seems like they didn't believe it, and instead decided@to watch out for the outcome with their own eyes.
…Sakuya.
Here too… The Magical Girls of Torayamachi@are on their way too!!

group_1.textLeft: …If it comes to this,@we might as well go after them ourselves.
The relationship between Torayamachi and@Ryuugasaki has been growing increasingly@strained over the policy issue.
Someone has to stop them before that gap@becomes unbridgeable.

group_1.textRight: Before that, we ought to stop the duel itself.

group_1.textLeft: …That’s true.
Apologies to Juri, but we’ve got to stop this@before it turns into a tumult…
By the way, can you contact Yuna or Juri…?

group_1.textRight: I mean, they’ve already started.@I doubt we’ll get through…

group_1.textLeft: Ugh. I know, right…

group_1.textCenter: There we go, Juri: I got us our first win.@Your turn now, lil’ rascal!
And hey, I’m also gonna win round two!

group_1.textLeft: [surround:1024A04][chara:102102:effect_7000_attack01]Yes, yes, HELL YES!!

group_1.textRight: [chara:102102:effect_7002_damage01][surround:1024A05][bgEffect:shakeSmall]Nn… not bad…

group_1.textLeft: Kick it up a notch, Yuna!!
